title: Toukarl Sheep Hon Mura
original_name: 東カール・シープホーン村
sinopse: Marian's parents promised to return in 4 days, but they have not been heard from for 4 weeks. In the meantime, Marian has been living at her relative's place. One morning, she wakes up to find herself in a village where everyone looks like animals, but behave and talk like humans.
